mapper.select: select '重点区域' lx,ka.name lb,'-' sl,'-' dw,'-' fwms from itms_key_area ka union all select '道路交通' lx, ir.dljtlx lb,IFNULL(ir.dljtsl,'0') sl,IFNULL(ir.dljtdw,'无') dw,'-' fwms from itms_road ir union all select '公共场所' lx,pp.ggcslx lb,IFNULL(pp.ggcssl,'0') sl,'-' dw,'-' fwms from itms_public_place pp union all select '特殊地段' lx,sa.ddmc lb,'-' sl,'-' dw,IFNULL(sa.fwms,'无') fwms from itms_special_area sa order by lx desc
